name: Lacewing
overview: A multi-directional open source shooter created by Linley Henzell (known for Dungeon Crawl, currently known as Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup) and Captain Pork for Amiga OS4.x. Game has one and two player mode and has a duel mode for two players to square off against each other as well. Choose your ship and add upgrades to it. It plays a little bit like a cross between Spacewar and Centipede. It has a decidedly retro style to it . It has a single-player mode, and also co-operative and duel modes for two players (split-screen).
